Activity.description: An activity is something that occurs over a period of time and acts upon or with entities; it may include consuming, processing, transforming, modifying, relocating, using, or generating entities.

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format.

id.description: An identifier that uniquely represents an entity.

update_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was updated in ISO 8601 format.

Activity.title: Activity

AnatomicalEntity.description: An anatomical entity is an object that is a structural part (material or immaterial) of a biological entity.

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format.

id.description: An identifier that uniquely represents an entity.

update_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was updated in ISO 8601 format.

AnatomicalEntity.title: AnatomicalEntity

Attribute.description: A key/value pair that further characterizes an entity.

key_type.description: The semantic type for the key of an attribute.

value_type.description: The semantic type for the value of an attribute.

Attribute.title: Attribute

BiologicalEntity.description: A biological entity is a heterogeneous substance that contains genomic material or is the product of a biological process.

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format.

id.description: An identifier that uniquely represents an entity.

update_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was updated in ISO 8601 format.

CellLine.description: A cultured cell population that represents a genetically stable and homogenous population of cultured cells that shares a common propagation history

Committee.description: A group of people organized for a specific purpose.

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format.

id.description: An identifier that uniquely represents an entity.

update_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was updated in ISO 8601 format.

Committee.title: Committee

DataAccessCommittee.description: A group of members that are delegated to grant access to one or more datasets after ensuring the minimum criteria for data sharing has been met, and request for data use does not raise ethical and/or legal concerns.

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format.

has_members.description: All the members that are part of this data access committee.

id.description: An identifier that uniquely represents an entity.

main_contact.description: The main contact for the data access committee.

update_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was updated in ISO 8601 format.

DataAccessCommittee.title: DataAccessCommittee

DataAccessPolicy.description: A data access policy specifies under which circumstances, legal or otherwise, a user can have access to one or more datasets belonging to one or more studies.

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format.

description.description: A short description for the Data Access Policy.

has_data_access_committee.description: The Data Access Committee linked to this policy.

id.description: An identifier that uniquely represents an entity.

policy_url.description: The URL for the policy, if available.

update_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was updated in ISO 8601 format.

DataAccessPolicy.title: DataAccessPolicy

Dataset.description: A dataset is a collection of files that represents data generated from a particular sample.

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format.

files.description: One or more files that collectively make this dataset.

has_data_access_policy.description: The Data Access Policy that applies to this dataset.

has_experiment.description: One or more experiments that collectively are part of the dataset

has_file.description: One or more files that collectively are part of the dataset

has_study.description: One or more studies that collectively are part of the dataset

id.description: An identifier that uniquely represents an entity.

update_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was updated in ISO 8601 format.

Experiment.description: An experiment is an investigation that consists of a coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data with the goal of verifying, falsifying, or establishing the validity of a hypothesis.

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format.

has_library.description: The library associated with this experiment.

has_protocol.description: The protocol associated with this experiment.

has_sample.description: The sample associated with this experiment.

has_study.description: The study associated with this experiment.

id.description: An identifier that uniquely represents an entity.

update_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was updated in ISO 8601 format.

Experiment.title: Experiment

category.description: The category for this file: Whole Genome Sequencing, Whole Exome Sequencing, etc.

file_index.description: The index for this file. Commonly for BAM/VCF files.

format.description: The format of the file: BAM, SAM, CRAM, BAI, etc.

id.description: An identifier that uniquely represents an entity.

type.description: The file type: Aligned Reads, Unaligned Reads, etc.

files.description: One or more files that collectively make this dataset.

Protocol.description: A plan specification which has sufficient level of detail and quantitative information to communicate it between investigation agents, so that different investigation agents will reliably be able to independently reproduce the process.

id.description: A PMID or DOI for the publication.

ResearchActivity.description: A planned process executed in the performance of scientific research wherein systematic investigations are performed to establish facts and reach new conclusions about phenomena in the world.

id.description: An identifier that uniquely represents an entity.

ResearchActivity.title: ResearchActivity

Sample.description: A sample is a limited quantity of something to be used for testing, analysis, inspection, investigation, demonstration, or trial use. This could be either an individual, or sets of individuals from a population, or a portion of a substance like an isolate or tissue.

biosample_accession.description: BioSample accession. For example, if the Sample is from EBI BioSamples.

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format.

files.description: One or more files that are linked to this Sample.

geographical_region.description: A geographical region associated with the sample.

has_anatomical_site.description: Anatomical site from which the sample was retrieved.

has_cell_line.description: Type of cell line that was used.

has_disease_of_phenotypic_feature.description: The phenotype or disease associated with the individual from which the sample was taken.

id.description: An identifier that uniquely represents an entity.

update_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was updated in ISO 8601 format.

Sample.title: Sample

Study.description: Studies are experimental investigations of a particular phenomenon. It involves a detailed examination and analysis of a subject to learn more about the phenomenon being studied.

abstract.description: The study abstract that describes the goals. Can also hold abstract from a publication related to the study.

attributes.description: Custom key/value pairs that further characterizes the study.

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format.

id.description: An identifier that uniquely represents an entity.

name.description: A short name for the study.

publications.description: The publication(s) associated with this study.

title.description: A descriptive title for the study.

type.description: The study type. For example, "Cancer Genomics", "Epigenetics", "Exome Sequencing".

update_date.description: Timestamp when the entity was updated in ISO 8601 format.

Study.title: Study
